headline: How The Story Around Energy Vault Holdings (NRGV) Is Shifting After Guidance And Cash Updates
summary: The recent move in Energy Vault Holdings’ price target to US$2 comes alongside an unchanged fair value estimate of 3.73 and only small tweaks to inputs like the 9.34% discount rate and roughly 57.83% revenue growth assumption, which indicates that the core valuation story is largely intact. This update reflects a mix of optimism around factors such as reaffirmed 2025 revenue guidance and expected Investment Tax Credit monetization, balanced against ongoing questions about execution and how...
